p: The prevalence of S68G mutation and K65R/S68G double mutation among various subtypes of HIV-1 was analyzed in reverse transcriptase inhibitor (RTI)-naive and RTI-treated individuals from the HIV Drug Resistance Database of Stanford University ( https://hivdb.stanford.edu/cgi-bin/MutPrevBySubtypeRx.cgi; version of 19 April 2019). For patients having more than one isolates with the same mutation are counted once. Mutations occurring in â‰¥1% and at least two individuals were included in the analyses. All sequences with a mixture of mutations were excluded from the analyses.
